title: Hell Chain Hotel - Novel Updates
tags: Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Demons   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Monsters   Orphans   Past Plays a Big Role
author: 长生千叶
description:
Wennuan found a job in a hotel lobby with a good salary, five star social insurance and one housing fund, including food and housing, but the name of the hotel is a bit unlucky

——Hell Chain Hotel (Huangquan First Store)

[Emperor Executive Suite]——999999 yuan (free breakfast)

Qin Shihuang: The magnificence of the suite is comparable to the Afang Palace, which sets off my dignity, and I am very pleased!

[Sweet couple deluxe room]-5200 yuan (couple breakfast for 2 people)

Xiang Yu: Why do you let me live in the same room with Liu Bang’s little white face? I have never seen such a weird double room! What, the hotel is full?

[Pansidong Theme Superior Room]-1111 yuan (excluding breakfast)

Spider spirit: Bei Piao has been a model for so many years, the first time I saw such a lively theme room, it seems to have returned to his hometown!

*

Wenuan: Hello, the front desk of the hotel, what can I do for you?

Baili Wuchang: I need special service, come to my room.

Wennuan:? ? ?>
